text:
Kelly Fiona Mason (born 16 June 1987) is a New Zealand water polo player. She is a member of the New Zealand women's national water polo team. She played at the 2007 World Aquatics Championships, 2009 World Aquatics Championships, and 2011 World Aquatics Championships.
She was educated at Avondale College, Auckland. She played for the University of Hawaii's women's water polo team.

annotations.surface_form: New Zealand women's national water polo team
